3. tcp çŠ¶æ€å˜è¿

å›¾ç‰‡æ¥æºï¼šã€ŠTCP/IP è¯¦è§£å· 1ï¼šåè®®ã€‹ â€“ 18.6 tcp çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜è¿å›¾

// tcp_states.h
enum {
    TCP_ESTABLISHED = 1,
    TCP_SYN_SENT,
    TCP_SYN_RECV,
    TCP_FIN_WAIT1,
    TCP_FIN_WAIT2,
    TCP_TIME_WAIT,
    TCP_CLOSE,
    TCP_CLOSE_WAIT,
    TCP_LAST_ACK,
    TCP_LISTEN,
    TCP_CLOSING,    /* Now a valid state */
    TCP_NEW_SYN_RECV,

    TCP_MAX_STATES    /* Leave at the end! */
};
